1 metre this amigurumi pattern is crocheted in the round beginning at the foot and finishing at the crown of the head a stitch marker is recommended to mark the start of each round maintain strong gauge as you work to keep your stitches tight and give the doll form after finishing off hide yarn ends by pulling them to the inside of the doll key us crochet terms st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet repeat repeat half_double_crochet half_double_crochet round round double_crochet double_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 sts together tc treble_crochet instructions arms make two - using tan yarn a round # details total # of sts 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 single_crochet 6 into the ring pull closed 6 2 * single_crochet into next 2 sts 2sc into next st repeat from * to end of round 8 3-11 single_crochet into each st to end of round fasten_off after round 11 8 body using tan yarn a round # details total # of sts 1 beginning at bottom of foot make an magic_ring chain 1 single_crochet 6 into the ring 6 pull closed 2 work 2sc into each st to end of round 12 *insert a stitch marker to keep track of the row starting spot move marker up after each round 3 * single_crochet into next st 2sc into next st repeat from * to end of round 18 4 single_crochet blo into each st to end of round 18 5 single_crochet into each st to end of round 18 6 single_crochet into next 2 sts decrease 7 times single_crochet into next two sts 11 7-12 single_crochet into each st to end of round fasten_off after round 12 11 repeat rnds 1-12 for second leg do not fasten_off make sure you re at the centre back of the leg 2 single_crochet into next 3 sts until you are at the side of the leg then single_crochet into st 8 on 13 the other leg to join them this will be the middle of the inner leg continue to single_crochet around both legs to make one round 22 the round ends where the two legs join 14-17 single_crochet into each st to end of round 22 18 make sure you re at the centre back of the doll single_crochet into next 4 sts decrease single_crochet 20 into next 10 sts decrease single_crochet into next 4 sts 19 * single_crochet into next 3 sts decrease repeat from * to end of round 16 20 single_crochet into each st to end of round 16 make sure you re at the centre back single_crochet into the next 4 sts then single_crochet into any st of round 11 of an arm continue to single_crochet into the next 7sts around
